Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from O'Hare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from O'Hare.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Sheridan/Briar
ShortDescription: Westbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Broadway, Belmont, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Briar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Broadway, Belmont, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Briar.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Briar
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Diversey, Broadway, Belmont, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Briar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Diversey, Broadway, Belmont, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Briar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Pk Exp buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable LSD near Roosevelt/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable Lake Shore Drive near Roosevelt/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
